Package ohos.agp.render.render3d

Interface Entity


  • public interface Entity
    Represents a general object in a scene.

    An entity can consist of multiple components that define the behaviors and characteristics of the entity. In the entity hierarchy, an entity can have multiple child entities.

    Since:
    3

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static int INVALID_ENTITY
      Indicates the ID of an invalid entity.

    • Field Detail

      • INVALID_ENTITY

        static final int INVALID_ENTITY
        Indicates the ID of an invalid entity.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        int getId​()
        Obtains the unique ID of an entity in a scene.
        Returns:
        Returns the ID of the entity.

      • isValid

        boolean isValid​()
        Checks whether an entity is valid.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the entity is valid; returns false otherwise.

      • addComponent

        <ComponentType extends Component> ComponentType addComponent​(Class<ComponentType> componentType)
        Adds a component of a specified type to an entity.

        The new component is initialized with the default value.

        Type Parameters:
        ComponentType - Indicates the type of the component to add to the entity.
        Parameters:
        componentType - Indicates the type of the component to add as a class object.
        Returns:
        Returns the new component added to the entity.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Throws this exception if the component type is not found.

      • getComponent

        <ComponentType extends Component> Optional<ComponentType> getComponent​(Class<ComponentType> componentType)
        Obtains the component of a specified type from the entity.
        Type Parameters:
        ComponentType - Indicates the type of the component to obtain from the entity.
        Parameters:
        componentType - Indicates the type of the component to obtain as a class object.
        Returns:
        Returns the component of the specified type. Returns null if the entity does not have the component of the specified type.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Throws this exception if the component type is not found.

      • setComponent

        <ComponentType extends Component> void setComponent​(ComponentType component)
        Sets the component data of an entity to the input component data.
        Type Parameters:
        ComponentType - Indicates the component type.
        Parameters:
        component - Indicates the component data to set.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Throws this exception if the component of the specified type is not found.
